类的使用
com.google.android.filament.ColorGrading.Builder

  • 使用ColorGrading.Builder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.google.android.filament  

    • com.google.android.filament中ColorGrading.Builder的使用

      返回ColorGrading.Builder的com.google.android.filament中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.channelMixer(float[] outRed, float[] outGreen, float[] outBlue)
      The channel mixer adjustment modifies each output color channel using the specified mix of the source color channels.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.contrast(float contrast)
      Adjusts the contrast of the image.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.curves(float[] shadowGamma, float[] midPoint, float[] highlightScale)
      Applies a curve to each RGB channel of the image.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.dimensions(int dim)
      When color grading is implemented using a 3D LUT, this sets the dimension of the LUT.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.exposure(float exposure)
      Adjusts the exposure of this image.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.format(ColorGrading.LutFormat format)
      When color grading is implemented using a 3D LUT, this sets the texture format of of the LUT.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.gamutMapping(boolean gamutMapping)
      Enables or disables gamut mapping to the destination color space's gamut.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.luminanceScaling(boolean luminanceScaling)
      Enables or disables the luminance scaling component (LICH) from the exposure value invariant luminance system (EVILS).
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.nightAdaptation(float adaptation)
      Controls the amount of night adaptation to replicate a more natural representation of low-light conditions as perceived by the human vision system.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.quality(ColorGrading.QualityLevel qualityLevel)
      Sets the quality level of the color grading.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.saturation(float saturation)
      Adjusts the saturation of the image.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.shadowsMidtonesHighlights(float[] shadows, float[] midtones, float[] highlights, float[] ranges)
      Adjusts the colors separately in 3 distinct tonal ranges or zones: shadows, mid-tones, and highlights.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.slopeOffsetPower(float[] slope, float[] offset, float[] power)
      Applies a slope, offset, and power, as defined by the ASC CDL (American Society of Cinematographers Color Decision List) to the image.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.toneMapper(ToneMapper toneMapper)
      Selects the tone mapping operator to apply to the HDR color buffer as the last operation of the color grading post-processing step.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.toneMapping(ColorGrading.ToneMapping toneMapping)
      已过时。 
      Use toneMapper(ToneMapper)
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.vibrance(float vibrance)
      Adjusts the saturation of the image based on the input color's saturation level.
      ColorGrading.Builder ColorGrading.Builder.whiteBalance(float temperature, float tint)
      Adjusts the while balance of the image.
